NL Question: What is the average purchase amount for purchases made with BankCards, grouped by the provider of the PhoneNumber that was used in a MoneyTransfer WITH that purchase, and how many purchases are there for each provider?
Cypher:
MATCH (p:Purchase)-[:WITH_CARD]->(bc:BankCard)
MATCH (mt:MoneyTransfer)-[:WITH]->(pn:PhoneNumber)
WHERE EXISTS { MATCH (p)-[:WITH_CARD]->(bc) MATCH (mt)-[:WITH]->(pn) }
WITH pn.provider AS provider, p
WITH provider, AVG(p.amount) AS averageAmount, COUNT(p) AS purchaseCount
RETURN provider, averageAmount, purchaseCount
ORDER BY provider
